summary: Diff introduces a new utility to determine transaction direction from `transactionType` and adds/updates several components to use direction-based color classes. However, due to truncation and limited evidence, it is not fully verifiable that all required amount displays (including Monthly/Day-wise HTML reports and FilterTransactions real transaction rows) were updated and that no sign-based logic remains.

missing_requirements.requirement: Monthly Transactions HTML report uses outgoing=red/incoming=green consistently for the amount cell.
missing_requirements.reason: MonthlyTransactions.tsx is truncated and the diff summary does not show any changes to the HTML report generation portion (if present) or evidence that amount coloring was applied in the generated report.

missing_requirements.requirement: Day-wise Transactions generated HTML report uses outgoing=red/incoming=green for all amount cells and summary lines.
missing_requirements.reason: DaywiseTransactions.tsx is truncated and the diff summary does not show the HTML report generation code/strings updated to apply the new direction-based coloring.

missing_requirements.requirement: Filter Transactions: amount text for filtered real transaction rows is red for outgoing and green for incoming using transactionType (and derived rows treated as outgoing/red).
missing_requirements.reason: FilterTransactions.tsx only shows an import of `getDerivedRowAmountColor` (for derived rows). There is no visible evidence that real transaction rows use `getAmountColorFromType`/direction-based coloring, and the file is truncated before the rendering section.

missing_requirements.requirement: No amount coloring uses `Number(amount) >= 0` as the primary determinant for in/out coloring.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show the actual amount-rendering sections in all components (files are truncated), so it cannot be confirmed that any prior sign-based coloring logic was removed everywhere.

hallucinated_features.description: Added icon background and icon color helpers for transaction direction (green/red) beyond just amount text coloring.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to color transaction amount text by direction; icon color/background APIs are additional UI behavior not requested.
